name: Example Gmail Extension
description: Example extension showing use of the Streak Gmail SDK

content_security_policy.sandbox: sandbox allow-scripts; https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/vue@2.5.17/dist/vue.js https://apis.google.com https://apis.google.com/js/client.js https://ajax.googleapis.com https://designshack.net/favicon.ico https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/3.3.1/jquery.min.js https://aui-cdn.atlassian.com https://netdna.bootstrapcdn.com https://tarruda.github.com  https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com https://ydn-src-2.storage.googleapis.com  https://www.google.com/  ; default-src 'self'; object-src 'self'
